SfxId.Wiki: SfxId for weather -1: No weather Sfx Set for indoor and outdoor use. Items that can be erased with Above Shadow, such as raindrops of interactive particles, are OK here.

WindSfxId.Wiki: Wind SfxId -1: No wind Sfx Created only outdoors

GroundHitSfxId.Wiki: SfxId for ground hit effect -1: None for ground hit effect

WetTime.Wiki: Time to get completely wet (time until the weight of m00_00_0000_WeatherBase reaches 1.0) -1: No wetness (m00_00_0000_WeatherBase remains 0.0)

GparamId.Wiki: Specify the XXX part of Gparam (m00_00_? XXX_WeatherOutdoor.gparamxml) for outdoor weather. Gparam to be used can be shared between weather.

NextLotIngameSecondsMin.Wiki: Specify the minimum time to the next weather lottery in in-game seconds. When transitioning to this weather, the time to the next weather will be a random time between the minimum and maximum.

NextLotIngameSecondsMax.Wiki: Specify the maximum time until the next weather lottery in in-game seconds. When transitioning to this weather, the time to the next weather will be a random time between the minimum and maximum.

WetSpEffectId00.Wiki: Special effect ID on the character (-1: None)

WetSpEffectId01.Wiki: Special effect ID on the character (-1: None)

WetSpEffectId02.Wiki: Special effect ID on the character (-1: None)

WetSpEffectId03.Wiki: Special effect ID on the character (-1: None)

WetSpEffectId04.Wiki: Special effect ID on the character (-1: None)

SfxIdInoor.AltName: Weather SFX - Indoors Only - SFX ID
SfxIdInoor.Wiki: Weather SfxId -1: No weather Sfx indoors only

SfxIdOutdoor.AltName: Weather SFX - Outdoors Only - SFX ID
SfxIdOutdoor.Wiki: Weather SfxId -1: No weather Sfx, outdoor only

DistViewWeatherGparamOverrideWeight.AltName: Overwrite Weight Valuue in Distant View Camera
DistViewWeatherGparamOverrideWeight.Wiki: Overwrite weight value in distant view camera (SEQ16724)
